stories.headline: Thousands of CEOs just admitted AI had no impact on employment or productivity
Reverse Engineering Sid Meier's Railroad Tycoon for DOS from 1990
GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics
stories.summary: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.

stories.headline: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT
stories.summary: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT to help organizations defend against prompt injection and AI-driven data exfiltration.

stories.headline: Beyond rate limits: scaling access to Codex and Sora
stories.summary: How OpenAI built a real-time access system combining rate limits, usage tracking, and credits to power continuous access to Sora and Codex.

stories.headline: Scaling social science research
stories.summary: GABRIEL is a new open-source toolkit from OpenAI that uses GPT to turn qualitative text and images into quantitative data, helping social scientists analyze research at scale.

stories.headline: Tesla Sales Down 55% UK, 58% Spain, 59% Germany, 81% Netherlands, 93% Norway
Introducing GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark
stories.summary: Introducing GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark—our first real-time coding model. 15x faster generation, 128k context, now in research preview for ChatGPT Pro users.

stories.headline: U.S. court bars OpenAI from using ‘Cameo’
stories.summary: OpenAI has renamed its feature in Sora from "Cameo" to "Characters."

stories.headline: Intellexa’s Predator spyware used to hack iPhone of journalist in Angola, research says
stories.summary: Amnesty International says it found evidence that a government customer of Intellexa, a sanctioned surveillance vendor, used its Predator spyware against a prominent journalist in Angola.

stories.headline: Jack Altman joins Benchmark as GP
stories.summary: Jack Altman and Benchmark announced today that he would be joining the firm as a general partner.

stories.headline: Apple is reportedly cooking up a trio of AI wearables
stories.summary: As the AI hardware space heats up, the iPhone maker has multiple smart products in development.

stories.headline: Thrive raises $10B for new fund, its largest yet
stories.summary: Thrive Capital just raised $10 billion for its new fund -- nearly double the size of its last fund.
